data.title: UEFA Women's EURO 2022 Betting Odds And History
data.text:
Women's Euro 2022

England are odds on favourites at 4/5 (1.8) to win Euro 2022 outright, and Germany is 11/10 (2.10)

England are 7/5 (2.40) to win the game in 90 minutes, and Germany is 11/5 (3.20) to win the game in 90 minutes.

A draw in 90 minutes is around 12/5 (3.40).

Remember extra time and penalties may play a part if the game is all square after 90 minutes.

Euro 2022 Betting Update

All football tips are now available on all leagues. .

England beat Germany 2-1 in the Euro 2022 Final.

England, France, Germany and Sweden progress to the Semi-Finals.

Austria, Belgium, England, France, Germany, Netherlands, Spain and Sweden qualify for the last eight.

Tonight one of Belgium, Iceland, or Italy will be the final country to qualify.

Switzerland and Portugal miss out with Sweden and the Netherlands progressing to the Quarter Finals.

Denmark, Finland, Norway and Northern Ireland are out of the tournament, but all other teams are still in with a chance of a Quarter Final place.

The Netherlands & Sweden win their first games in a tight Group C.

An efficient and organised Germany beat original tournament favourites Spain 2-0.

Spain are on the drift with all the online bookmakers.

England put 8 past Norway and joined France at the head of the betting.

France (3/1) leapt to the top of the betting after looking dynamic in their opening win against Italy.

I love watching the Lionesses, I have watched them for a number of years and have been impressed by the significant improvements made by the team.

OLBG Member: Boomboomshaketheroom

Euro 2022 Countries Bookmaker Percentage Chance Of Winning The Tournament England 55.56% Germany 47.62% France 25.00% Spain 16.67% Sweden 0.00% Netherlands 0.00% Norway 0.00% Denmark 0.00% Italy 0.00% Switzerland 0.00% Austria 0.79% Belgium 0.66% Iceland 0.00% Portugal 0.00% Finland 0.00% Northern Ireland 0.00%

Euro 2022 Pre Tournament Betting

Most of the best betting sites now have Spain as favourites for the Women's Euro 2022 Championship.

The most popular outcome is how the market is priced a Semi-Final line up of England, Spain, Netherlands and France.

The Euro 2022 group games Germany v Spain and Netherlands v Sweden should give us clues to the relative strength of those sides, and whether the 5th and 6th countries in the betting (Germany and Sweden) can cause an upset.

England Women's team manager Sarina Wiegman will be hoping she can guide the Lionesses to Euro 2022 glory.

Euro 2022 Group Stage

The draw for the Euro 2022 Group stage took place on the 28th of October 2021 in Manchester.

Group matches will be played between the 6th of July and 18th of July 2022

Group A Win The Group England 2/5 Austria 16/5 Norway 25/1 Northern Ireland 200/1

Group B Win The Group Spain 4/7 Germany 9/4 Denmark 12/1 Finland 200/1

Group C Win The Group Netherlands 5/6 Sweden 7/5 Switzerland 25/1 Portugal 100/1

Group D Win The Group France 1/4 Italy 9/2 Belgium 12/1 Iceland 12/1

Danielle Van De Donk and Kosovare Asllani

Photo: Romain Biard / Shutterstock.com

Betting On Euro 2022

You can place a bet on the UEFA Women's Euro 2022 using the odds above. Most of the best betting sites will have odds on the tournament.

Euro 2022 Individual Match Odds

There are a total of 31 games at the Women's Euro 2022.

The bookmakers will offer betting odds on each individual game.

Euro 2022 Group Winners

In the four groups, there can only be one winner, there will be a betting market on which country will win their group.

Euro 2022 To Qualify

In the four groups, two teams will qualify for the Quarter-Finals.

Euro 2022 Top Goalscorer

Euro 2022 Winners

The most popular market will be betting on which country will win the competition outright.

Placing a bet before a game has been played should secure the best odds for you, once the tournament has commenced the odds will change.

Name The Euro 2022 Finalists

In this market, you just have to predict which two countries will compete in the Women's Euro 2022 final.

Euro 2022 Accumulators

With accumulators, you can place a bet on a range of outcomes such as selecting all 4 group winners, or 4 teams to qualify or naming the 4 Semi-Finalists.

To discover how accumulators are priced and the differing option please check out the excellent betting school article titled Football Accumulator Advice

New To Football Betting

If you do not have an active online betting account, then head over to our betting sites section where you will see a list of bookmakers available in the UK.

We have in-depth reviews so you can see what other users think of them before deciding, or head over to the free bets page where you can see the list of welcome offers currently available from all UK betting sites.

Most bookmakers have betting apps you simply need to go to your favourite betting app and head to the football or soccer section in the menu, then select UEFA Women's Euro 2022 Betting.
